thread.title: Colorado vs. ASU: What to watch for
thread.title_full: Colorado vs. ASU: What to watch for

title: Colorado vs. ASU: What to watch for
text:
Colorado vs. ASU: What to watch for The Colorado Buffaloes will look to halt the Sun Devils recent momentum this Saturday. Post to Facebook Colorado vs. ASU: What to watch for The Colorado Buffaloes will look to halt the Sun Devils recent momentum this Saturday.   12news.com: http://12ne.ws/1LkMQpX   Join the Conversation To   Colorado vs. ASU: What to watch for Robby Baker , 12 Sports 3:52 p.m. MST October 8, 2015 The Colorado Buffaloes will look to halt the Sun Devils recent momentum this Saturday. Oct 3, 2015; Pasadena, CA, USA; Arizona State Sun Devils wide receiver Tim White (12) celebrates after scoring a touchdown against the UCLA Bruins during the game at Rose Bowl. Mandatory Credit: Richard Mackson-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Richard Mackson-USA TODAY Sports) 
It ' s a trap! 
As Admiral Ackbar said, " It ' s a trap! " 
The Colorado Buffaloes are a sneaky 3-2 team, and were one crazy finish against Hawaii from being 4-1. 
This is the definition of a trap game. 
More College Football: College football coaches piling up more cash through bonuses 
Sun Devil fans remember a trip to Corvallis last season when ASU was the sixth ranked team in the country, but the Beavers played spoiler and bested the Devils. 
The good news for ASU is this is a home game, so they should have some extra energy come kick off. 
These are tough games for college teams though. 
Coming off a huge, upset victory, taking on a team you ' re widely expected to beat handily, it could be hard to get up for this game. 
Head coach Todd Graham will have to make sure his team doesn ' t overlook Colorado, as ASU ' s matchup against the upstart Utah Utes is just around the corner. 
' Blackout the Buffs ' 
Saturday will be ASU ' s annual ' blackout ' game. There's been a lot of questions about the uniform this week. here it is! #blackoutbuffs @adidasFballUS @FootballASU pic.twitter.com/nFyl1j7U56
